name: UMS Tech Labs
tag_list: computer-software-solution-providers, google-apps-integrators, email-solution-providers, corporate-email-solution-providers, product-development-cloud-computing, cloud-products, mobile-products, web-products, computer-software-developers-for-internet, pyt
overview:
UMS Tech Labs is the Product Development division of UMS Consultants, a Google Apps Authorized Reseller and Google Apps Implementation and Migration Specialists. UMS works with small and medium businesses, schools, colleges and universities to help them move on the Cloud. We give our clients a competitive advantage – functional, reliable and flexible computing through on-demand software (SaaS) with significant cost-savings.

UMS focuses on developing Cloud Apps, Google Apps for Education, Google Apps for Business, Next Gen Technology Consultancy, Mobile Apps, Single Sign On, Bulk Users Provisioning, Automatic Email Routing, Email Security, Bulk Email Marketing Product, Custom SSO Login Page for Google Apps.

Our client list is spread across the globe and includes major clients like BITS Pilani University (Dubai, Goa, Hyderabad and Pilani). We actively operate in UK, Dubai, Singapore and India. We are an Agile Company and strongly believe in Innovation, Synchronization and Perfection.

We have worked with very large scale implementations of Google Apps (largest being 35,000+ users). We have our own data center facility as well: clouddatanet.com and a more youth oriented brand for the same: arrabaap.com

For more details please visit our website www.umstechlabs.com
